S

SCROLL_FLAG_ENTER_ALWAYS - Static variable in class com.underlegendz.underactivity.ActivityBuilder
When entering (scrolling on screen) the view will scroll on any downwards scroll event, regardless of whether the scrolling view is also scrolling.
SCROLL_FLAG_ENTER_ALWAYS_COLLAPSED - Static variable in class com.underlegendz.underactivity.ActivityBuilder
An additional flag for 'enterAlways' which modifies the returning view to only initially scroll back to it's collapsed height.
SCROLL_FLAG_EXIT_UNTIL_COLLAPSED - Static variable in class com.underlegendz.underactivity.ActivityBuilder
When exiting (scrolling off screen) the view will be scrolled until it is 'collapsed'.
SCROLL_FLAG_SCROLL - Static variable in class com.underlegendz.underactivity.ActivityBuilder
The view will be scroll in direct relation to scroll events.
SCROLL_FLAG_SNAP - Static variable in class com.underlegendz.underactivity.ActivityBuilder
Upon a scroll ending, if the view is only partially visible then it will be snapped and scrolled to it's closest edge.

U

UnderActivity - Class in com.underlegendz.underactivity
 
UnderActivity() - Constructor for class com.underlegendz.underactivity.UnderActivity
 
UnderActivityBind - Interface in com.underlegendz.underactivity
If the activity passed to ActivityRender implement this interface it can receive the references of activity components and bind then in class variables.
